parts.text: {"word":"stechen","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"刺す、突く (鋭利なもので)","english_definition":"to stab, prick, pierce (with a sharp object)","examples":[{"sentence":"Er stach ihn mit einem Messer.","translation":"彼は彼をナイフで刺した。","sentence":"Sie stach sich in den Finger.","translation":"彼女は指を刺してしまった。","sentence":"Die Biene hat mich gestochen.","translation":"ハチが私を刺した。"}],"collocations":["mit einem Messer stechen (ナイフで刺す)","in den Finger stechen (指を刺す)","eine Biene sticht (ハチが刺す)"],"synonyms":["pieksen","durchbohren","verletzen"],"antonyms":["heilen","verarzten"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"彫る、刻む (版画など)","english_definition":"to engrave, etch (a print, etc.)","examples":[{"sentence":"Er stach das Bild in Kupfer.","translation":"彼はその絵を銅版に彫った。","sentence":"Die Künstlerin stach filigrane Muster in das Holz.","translation":"その芸術家は繊細な模様を木に彫った。"}],"collocations":["ein Bild in Kupfer stechen (絵を銅版に彫る)","Muster in Holz stechen (模様を木に彫る)"],"synonyms":["gravieren","einkerben","ritzen"],"antonyms":["zeichnen","malen"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(痛みなどが)刺すように痛む、ズキズキする","english_definition":"(of pain) to be stabbing, shooting, throbbing","examples":[{"sentence":"Mein Herz sticht.","translation":"心臓がズキズキ痛む。","sentence":"Der Schmerz sticht wie Messerstiche.","translation":"その痛みはナイフで刺されるようだ。"}],"collocations":["Das Herz sticht (心臓が痛む)","Der Schmerz sticht (痛みが刺す)"],"synonyms":["pochen","schmerzen","ziehen"],"antonyms":["nachlassen","abklingen"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(色などが)際立つ、目立つ、鮮やかである","english_definition":"(of colors, etc.) to stand out, be striking, be vivid","examples":[{"sentence":"Das Rot sticht besonders hervor.","translation":"赤色が特に際立っている。","sentence":"Die hellen Farben stechen vor dem dunklen Hintergrund.","translation":"明るい色が暗い背景に映える。"}],"collocations":["besonders hervorstechen (特に際立つ)","vor dem Hintergrund stechen (背景に映える)"],"synonyms":["auffallen","hervorheben","sich abheben"],"antonyms":["verschwimmen","verblassen"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","reflexive","definition":"(sich stechen) (トランプなどで)出し抜く、打ち負かす","english_definition":"(reflexive: sich stechen) to trump, outdo (in card games, etc.)","examples":[{"sentence":"Er stach sich mit dem Pik-Ass.","translation":"彼はスペードのエースで出し抜いた。","sentence":"Sie versuchte, sich mit einem höheren Trumpf zu stechen.","translation":"彼女はより強い切り札で出し抜こうとした。"}],"collocations":["sich mit einem Trumpf stechen (切り札で出し抜く)"],"synonyms":["übertrumpfen","ausstechen","besiegen"],"antonyms":["verlieren","nachgeben"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ゲルマン祖語の *stekan- に由来し、印欧祖語の *steg- (刺す、突く) に遡る。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈʃtɛçən/","syllables":"ste-chen"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["steche","stichst","sticht","stechen","stecht","stechen"],"past_simple":["stach","stachst","stach","stachen","stacht","stachen"],"past_participle":"gestochen","subjunctive_ii":["stäche","stächest","stäche","stächen","stächet","stächen"],"imperative":["stich!","stechen wir!","stecht!","stechen Sie!"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「stechen」は、鋭利なもので刺すという基本的な意味から派生して、版画を彫る、痛みが刺すように走る、色が際立つ、カードゲームで出し抜くなど、様々な意味を持つ動詞です。文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。再帰動詞として使われる場合（sich stechen）は、カードゲームなどで出し抜くという意味になります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Ich habe mich gestochen. (意図: 私は自分を刺した。)","correct":"Ich habe mich in den Finger gestochen. (私は指を刺してしまった。)","note":"再帰動詞として使う場合、具体的な場所や対象を明示することが多いです。"},{"incorrect":"Der Schmerz sticht wie ein Messer. (文法的に正しいが、より自然な表現がある)","correct":"Der Schmerz sticht wie Messerstiche. (痛みはナイフで刺されるようだ。)","note":"比喩表現では、複数形を使う方がより一般的です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["Stich (名詞: 刺し傷、一針、版画、切り札)","Stecher (名詞: 彫刻師、刺す人)","Stechmücke (名詞: カ)","Stechpalme (名詞: セイヨウヒイラギ)"],"compound_words":["abstechen (際立たせる、目立たせる)","ausstechen (型抜きする、出し抜く)","durchstechen (突き刺す、穴を開ける)","hervorstechen (際立つ、目立つ)","zustechen (刺し殺す)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1-B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度 (Relatively high frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「stechen」は、鋭利なもので「刺す」という意味の動詞です。例えば、ナイフで刺す、ハチが刺す、といった状況で使われます。また、痛みや色が「際立つ」という意味もあります。カードゲームで「出し抜く」という意味も持っています。文脈によって意味が異なるので、注意して使いましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Die Rose hat Dornen, die stechen.","translation":"バラには刺すトゲがある。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"刺す"},{"sentence":"Er stach ein Loch in das Leder.","translation":"彼は革に穴を開けた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"刺す"},{"sentence":"Die Nadel stach in meinen Arm.","translation":"針が私の腕に刺さった。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"刺す"},{"sentence":"Der Schmerz sticht wie ein Messer.","translation":"その痛みはナイフで刺されるようだ。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"(痛みが)刺す"},{"sentence":"Die rote Farbe sticht ins Auge.","translation":"その赤色は目に鮮やかだ。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"(色が)際立つ"},{"sentence":"Er versuchte, seinen Gegner auszustechen.","translation":"彼は相手を出し抜こうとした。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"出し抜く"}]}
